recipe.title: Moroccan-Style Preserved Lemons
ingredients: 1 to 1 1/2 cups fresh lemon juice (from 5 to 6 additional lemons)
a 6-cup jar with a tight-fitting lid
instructions: Blanch lemons in boiling water 5 minutes, then drain. When cool enough to handle, cut each lemon into 8 wedges, discarding seeds. Toss lemons with kosher salt in a bowl, then pack lemons, along with their salt, tightly into jar. Add enough lemon juice to cover lemons. Seal jar and let lemons stand at room temperature, shaking gently once a day, for 5 days. Add oil to jar and refrigerate.
